ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: My bard worships the Tribunal, and I am NOT KOS in Upper Guk. ... Steven S. Klug -- sklug@hightower.com
ygData.messageBody:
My bard worships the Tribunal, and I am NOT KOS in Upper Guk.

At 03:45 PM 10/5/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>I had heard that froggies seem to hate the fence-sitters actually. My
>friend was agnostic too. Could be they just cannot stand the idea of people
>without religion!
>
> Kitasi
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 3:46 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking
>
>
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Um.. My bard is agnostic, so unless the frogs are upset about that fact,
>that
>doesn't resolve my question either.
>
>Crier Sharpsong - (still) 25th (and holding) on fennin ro
>
>Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
>CDI at http://www.pigging.com/
>
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 4:32 PM
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking
>
>
>> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>>
>> Its more likely to be religion. I had a friend who went there and got
>> slaughtered despite never having even seen a froggie before in his life.
>I
>> wonder if any of us lorekeeper's out there has any charts showing the
>> effects of various religions on your factions?
>>
>> Kitasi, loved by all
>> except in Qeynos and Freeport!
>>
>
>>
Steven S. Klug
-- sklug@...
